text: hw allah aladhi 'anzal altmanynt fi qulub almuminin biallah warasulih yawm "alhdyby" fsknt, wrskh alyaqin fyha; liazdaduu tsdyqana lilah watbaeana larasuluh mae tsdyqhm watbaehm. walilah subhanah wteala junud alsmwat wal'ard yansur bihim eibadih almwmnyn. wakan allah elymana bmsalh khlqh, hkymana fi tdbyrh wsneh
